summary: The diff implements all four requirements with comprehensive frontend and backend changes. REQ-30 adds dashboard metrics overview, REQ-31 adds task assignments table, REQ-32 enforces employee access control via backend filtering, and REQ-33 adds work submission functionality. All acceptance criteria appear to be addressed with proper implementation evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) adds submissionTimestamp field to Task type and provides data migration logic
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not specify any data migration requirements or backward compatibility handling for the new submissionTimestamp field. This is implementation detail beyond the requested features.

hallucinated_features.description: useGetUserName hook for fetching user profile names by Principal
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-31 requires displaying 'assigned employee name' but does not explicitly request a new hook for fetching user names. This could be considered implementation detail, though it is necessary infrastructure.
